Breck

Breck.

An Oktoberfest of a Lifetime.

Oktoberfest 2018 is the largest street party in the Rocky Mountains. The September street party is where Munich meets the mountains!

Beer

36 brew vendors.

More than three-dozen genuine German cuisine and brew vendors.

Learn More

Steins are available in Liter and Half Liter sizes, reserve yours today!

Things to do in Breckenridge in the Fall

The town of Breckenridge is filled with fun things to do. Some must see spots are: Cuppa Joe Coffee, Breckenridge Brewery,Spa & Wellness Centers, and much much more!

Prost!

Tokens

Tokens can be purchased for $5 ahead of time, or for $6 at the door. Plan ahead and choose wisely!
